name: Herbal Remedies
description:
FULLSCREEN IT

A small game where you traverse through different minigames to procure ingredients that create a potion to save Farmer Paul, a farmer in a town without doctors, from his sickness.

Controls - 

W - Jump

A - Left

D - Right

Left Click - Shoot
